package.name: Catalog_Search_Refinement
package.summary: Allow your users to refine their search when they add a search term for FREE!
package.description: Allow your users to refine their search when they add a search term for FREE! This is a free and open source magento extension that modifies the Magento default search functionality to allow search refinement.
package.notes: Fixed an issue with Magento 1.7.x.x. Now works as expected for all supported versions 1.5.x.x, 1.6.x.x, and 1.7.x.x.
